    file, err := os.Open(*filename)
    if err != nil {
        return err
    }

    reader, writer := io.Pipe()

    go func() {
        gw := gzip.NewWriter(writer)
        _, err := io.Copy(gw, file)
        if err != nil {
            return
        }
        file.Close()
        gw.Close()
        writer.Close()
    }()

    uploader := s3manager.NewUploader(sess)

    _, err = uploader.Upload(&s3manager.UploadInput{
        Body:   reader,
        Bucket: bucket,
        Key:    key,
    })
